allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Flight Training Management System

Microservices architecture with the following services:
- User Service (8001): Authentication, authorization, user management
- Organization Service (8002): Multi-tenant organization management
- Aircraft Service (8003): Fleet and maintenance management
- Booking Service (8004): Resource scheduling and reservations
- Flight Service (8005): Flight operations and logging
- Weather Service (8006): Weather data integration
- Training Service (8007): Training programs and progress
- Theory Service (8008): Online courses, exams, certificates

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(certificate-service): Complete implementation of Certificate Service

Comprehensive pilot certification management system including:

Models:
- Certificate: Pilot licenses (PPL, CPL, ATPL), instructor certificates
- MedicalCertificate: Class 1, 2, 3, LAPL with age-based validity
- Rating: Type ratings, instrument, night, class ratings
- Endorsement: Solo, cross-country, knowledge test sign-offs
- Currency: FAR 61.57 and EASA FCL.060 tracking
- Verification: Certificate verification audit trail

Services:
- CertificateService: CRUD, verification, suspend/revoke/renew
- MedicalService: Validity calculations based on pilot age
- RatingService: Proficiency check tracking and type ratings
- EndorsementService: Digital signature support for instructors
- CurrencyService: Flight-based currency calculations
- ValidityService: Comprehensive pre-flight validity checks

API Endpoints:
- /api/v1/certificates/ - License management
- /api/v1/medicals/ - Medical certificate tracking
- /api/v1/ratings/ - Rating and privilege management
- /api/v1/endorsements/ - Instructor endorsements
- /api/v1/currency/ - Currency requirements and status
- /api/v1/validity/ - Validity checks and compliance reports

Features:
- Multi-tenant architecture with organization isolation
- UUID primary keys throughout
- Celery tasks for expiration monitoring
- Redis pub/sub for inter-service events
- Comprehensive test coverage

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat(finance-service): Complete implementation of Finance Service

Comprehensive financial management system for flight training organizations:

Models (Port 8010, finance_db):
- Account: Multi-type accounts (student, instructor, organization) with credit limits
- Transaction: Financial transactions (charges, payments, refunds, credits, adjustments)
- Invoice: Invoice management with line items (JSON storage)
- PricingRule: Flexible pricing (per_unit, flat, tiered, block) with multipliers
- CreditPackage: Pre-paid packages (flight hours, credits, mixed)
- UserPackage: User-owned packages with usage tracking and expiration
- PaymentMethod: Tokenized payment methods for PCI compliance

Services:
- AccountService: CRUD, balance ops, charge/credit, transfer, suspend/close
- TransactionService: Transaction creation, reversal, account balance sync
- InvoiceService: Invoice lifecycle, line items, payment recording
- PricingService: Price calculations with discounts and multipliers
- PackageService: Package purchase, credit/hours usage, expiration
- PaymentService: Stripe integration, payment processing, refunds

API Endpoints (REST):
- /api/v1/accounts/ - Account management
- /api/v1/transactions/ - Transaction operations
- /api/v1/invoices/ - Invoice management
- /api/v1/pricing-rules/ - Pricing configuration
- /api/v1/packages/ - Credit package definitions
- /api/v1/user-packages/ - User package management
- /api/v1/payment-methods/ - Payment method storage
- /api/v1/payments/ - Payment processing

Features:
- Multi-tenant architecture with organization isolation
- UUID primary keys throughout
- Decimal precision for all financial calculations
- Celery tasks: invoice reminders, payment retries, package expiration
- Redis pub/sub for inter-service events
- Comprehensive test coverage for models and services

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
